mapper.select:
select count(m.mib_cd) from MINBOUND m join ORDERS o on m.ord_cd = o.ord_cd join PRODUCT pr on pr.pro_cd = o.pro_cd join WAREHOUSE w on w.wh_cd = pr.wh_cd left join USER u on m.user_id = u.user_id
m.mib_cd like CONCAT('%',#{search1},'%') and pr.pro_name like CONCAT('%',#{search2},'%')
and m.mib_date between #{search3} and #{search4} and m.mib_date <= #{search4} and m.mib_date >= #{search3}
and mib_info_status = 0 and mib_info_status = 1

select count(p.pib_cd) from PINBOUND p join PERFORMANCE pe on p.per_cd = pe.per_cd join INSTRUCTION i on pe.ins_cd = i.ins_cd join PRODUCT pr on pr.pro_cd = i.pro_cd join WAREHOUSE w on w.wh_cd = pr.wh_cd left join USER u on p.user_id = u.user_id
p.pib_cd like CONCAT('%',#{search5},'%') and pr.pro_name like CONCAT('%',#{search6},'%')
and p.pib_date between #{search7} and #{search8} and p.pib_date <= #{search8} and p.pib_date >= #{search7}
and pib_info_status = 0 and pib_info_status = 1

select m.mib_cd, w.wh_cd, w.wh_mvol, o.ord_vol from MINBOUND m join ORDERS o on m.ord_cd = o.ord_cd join PRODUCT p on o.pro_cd = p.pro_cd join WAREHOUSE w on p.wh_cd = w.wh_cd where m.mib_cd = #{mib_cd}
select m.ord_cd from MINBOUND m join ORDERS o on m.ord_cd = o.ord_cd where m.mib_cd = #{mib_cd}
select o.pro_cd, o.ord_vol from ORDERS o join PRODUCT p on o.pro_cd = p.pro_cd where o.ord_cd = #{ord_cd}

select p.pib_cd, w.wh_cd, w.wh_mvol, pe.actual_completion_amount from PINBOUND p join PERFORMANCE pe on p.per_cd = pe.per_cd join INSTRUCTION i on pe.ins_cd = i.ins_cd join PRODUCT pr on pr.pro_cd = i.pro_cd join WAREHOUSE w on w.wh_cd = pr.wh_cd where p.pib_cd = #{pib_cd}
select p.per_cd from PINBOUND p join PERFORMANCE pe on p.per_cd = pe.per_cd where p.pib_cd = #{pib_cd}
select i.pro_cd, p.actual_completion_amount from PERFORMANCE p join INSTRUCTION i on p.ins_cd = i.ins_cd where p.per_cd = #{per_cd}

select count(o.ob_cd) from OUTBOUND o join CONTRACT c on o.con_cd = c.con_cd join PRODUCT pr on pr.pro_cd = c.pro_cd join WAREHOUSE w on w.wh_cd = pr.wh_cd left join USER u on o.user_id = u.user_id
o.ob_cd like CONCAT('%',#{search1},'%') and pr.pro_name like CONCAT('%',#{search2},'%')
and o.ob_date between #{search3} and #{search4} and o.ob_date <= #{search4} and o.ob_date >= #{search3}
and ob_info_status = 0 and ob_info_status = 1
select o.ob_cd, c.con_cd, c.pro_cd, p.pro_vol, c.con_vol from OUTBOUND o join CONTRACT c on o.con_cd = c.con_cd join PRODUCT p on p.pro_cd = c.pro_cd where o.ob_cd = #{ob_cd}
